0.6.name: wordpress/google-ajax-libraries-api-plugin
0.6.description:
The Google Ajax Libraries API Plugin is designed to make it easy to use the Google hosted libraries without the need to mess with your theme and plugin code.

When activated, the plugin will “listen” to all of the scripts added (via the WordPress wpenqueuescript function) to your pages header and automagically switch the locally hosted library to a Google hosted one. Deactivating the plugin will remove the “listener” and your site will return to using the local versions.

WordPress MU administrators should copy the plugin into their MU-Plugins directory for it to be enabled across all of your hosted blogs.
